summary: An anthropology student invites his classmates and professor to his family's abandoned ranch, once a sacred Chumash burial ground, to recreate an ancient ceremony.
cast: Wes Bentley|Kate Maberly|Ryan Donowho|Travis Van Winkle|Briana Evigan|Christian Slater|Stephen Dorff|Carly Schroeder|Ashley Hinshaw|Guy Burnet|Daniel Cudmore|Angelic Zambrana|Sharon Hinnendael|Mercedes Leggett|Nicholas Leiting|Alexi Yulish|Mylo Ironbear|Joseph Billingiere|Joseph Runningfox|Jennifer Bobiwash|Cristina Mendoza Lopez|Rita Rangel Monahan|Anastasia Patchick|Naydah Vasquez|Chuy Garcia|John Saint John|Andres Salazar|Alex Najar|James Neary|Andy Garza|Ralph Adrian Lopez|Nick Fouquet|Richard Johnson|Cal Oshi|Mark Madnick|C.J. Boyer|Greg Cooper|William D. Johnson|Krissy Terry
title: Rites of Passage
